text: Nnepa wo wiirimu nkina nkawaawa, unakushilhe inyipo yo idhahabu yo utusherera ubani nkaweemelha uholho wo madhubahu yo utushereriya ubani. Ni uyo nkawaavahiya ubani mwinchi athakanihe ni ulhapelha wa attu onkhaye a Nlhuku akumihe isadaka vachulhu madhubahu o idhahabu irii mmiholho wo ihiche yo imwene.
